applyTo: "README.md"
description: Main README file for the Copilot Collaginator project.
---

# Copilot Collaginator README.md

- Project documentation and setup instructions. 
- In the ABOUT section make a disclaimer that this project was created with the assistance of GitHub Copilot.
- Include a PROJECT TITLE section at the top with the name "Copilot Collaginator".
- Don't include the API url, but always include the content format of the JSON response from the API.
- In the SETUP section, include instructions for installing dependencies, configuring environment variables, and starting
- Include a "UPDATE LOG" section for future improvements. 
- The "UPDATE LOG" section should be at the end of the README.md file and each entry should follow this format: `* **YYYY-MM-DD**: Description of the update.` The newest entries should be at the top of the list. Never delete previous entries; just add new ones as needed.
